book.title: The Legend of Zelda™: Tears of the Kingdom
book.description: The Legend of Zelda: Tears of the Kingdom offers a vast world full of varied quests, challenging puzzles, ferocious monsters, and unique sights to behold.

book.title: Elon Musk
book.description: From the author of Steve Jobs and other bestselling biographies, this is the astonishingly intimate story of the most fascinating and controversial innovator of our era

book.title: The Ballad of Songbirds and Snakes
book.description: It is the morning of the reaping that will kick off the tenth annual Hunger Games. In the Capitol, eighteen-year-old Coriolanus Snow is preparing for his one shot at glory as a mentor in the Games.

book.title: The Wager: A Tale of Shipwreck, Mutiny and Murder
book.description: From the author of Killers of the Flower Moon, a page-turning story of shipwreck, survival, and savagery, culminating in a court martial that reveals a shocking truth.

book.title: Heart Bones: A Novel
book.description: Moving, passionate, and unforgettable, Colleen Hoover's novel follows two young adults from completely different backgrounds embarking on a tentative romance, unaware of what the future holds.

book.title: Oh, the Places You'll Go!
book.description: From soaring to high heights and seeing great sights to being left in a Lurch on a prickle-ly perch, Dr. Seuss addresses life’s ups and downs with his trademark humorous verse and whimsical illustrations.

book.title: Hello Beautiful (Oprah's Book Club)
book.description: From the author of Dear Edward comes a “powerfully affecting” (People) family story that asks: Can love make a broken person whole?

products.title: Echo Dot (5th Gen, 2022 release)
products.subtitle: With bigger vibrant sound, helpful routines and Alexa
products.description: OUR BEST SOUNDING ECHO DOT YET Enjoy an improved audio experience compared to any previous Echo Dot with Alexa for clearer vocals, deeper bass and vibrant sound in any room.

products.title: Amazon Fire TV 65
products.subtitle: Omni Series 4K UHD smart TV with Dolby Vision, hands-free with Alexa
products.description: Cinematic 4K entertainment - Get true-to-life picture quality and rich, brilliant colors with support for 4K Ultra HD, Dolby Vision, HDR 10, HLG, and Dolby Digital Plus, and control the TV hands-free with Alexa.HDR like you've never seen - Dolby Vision brings spectacular color, contrast, clarity, and brightness to your screen.

products.title: Bwine Drones F7 GPS
products.description: Uma câmera de vídeo 4K destacável com um clique, juntamente com lente FOV de 120° e sensor COMS maior trará a você a melhor experiência de fotografia aérea.

products.title: SAMSUNG Celular Galaxy S23 Ultra
products.description: Capture a noite em pouca luz: se você está indo para um show ou noite romântica, não há nada como iluminação ruim com o modo noturno; o Galaxy S23 Ultra permite capturar conteúdo épico em qualquer ambiente com deslumbrante Nightographtographtion

products.title: SJM-inems Fones de ouvido Bluetooth 5.0
products.description: Emparelhamento em um passo, 2 fones de ouvido da caixa de carregamento, você pode se conectar automaticamente um ao outro e, em apenas um passo, você pode simplesmente inserir a configuração Bluetooth do celular para emparelhar os fones de ouvido.
